To modify the boundary of the Mammoth Cave National Park in the State of Kentucky, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
Mammoth Cave National Park Boundary Adjustment Act of 2023
This bill authorizes the Department of the Interior to acquire specified acres of land for inclusion in Mammoth Cave National Park. Further, it adjusts for inflation the cap on the amount authorized to be appropriated to acquire property for inclusion in the park.
